name: Local Binary Pattern Analysis
description: Computes LBP descriptors to capture micro-texture characteristics. AI-generated images produce statistically distinct LBP distributions.
mechanism: Compares each pixel with 8 neighbors in circular pattern. Binary codes form histograms capturing micro-texture. AI images show higher uniform ratios.
parameters: Radius: 1, Neighbors: 8, Pattern type: uniform, Bins: 256
useCase: Detecting synthetic micro-texture patterns in AI images
